alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 9:05PM EDT until July 16 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 805 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Marianna, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Jacob City, Kynesville, Blue Spring, Steele City, Star, Two Egg, Simsville, Cottondale Airport, Jacobs, Chipola Terrace, Marianna Municipal A/P and Dellwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
